task.summary: Default task
testing git. I've moved the dir to my localhost.
Unite common code from admin_app/main.js and app/main.js to /scripts/init.js. Also append new file structure to non-admin part.
Create viewHelper helper to hold some common used code. Also some few fixes
Create viewHelper helper to hold some common used code. Also some few fixes
Rewrite ActiveRecord to use mysqli
Return set names to utf8, forgot it while transfering mysql_ to mysqli
Fix routing to projectShow.js and fix showing project's data in projectShow.js. Also add lodash ( _ ) to be global.
Fix pushing to array, the array should be replaced every time.
Remove form validation from activeRecord. Rename formValidation plugin to Validator. Since we forms aren't handled from PHP anymore we have to change the name.
Remove unnecessary files.
Fix signing in.
Implement sub menu navigation. We need better styling.
Fix subRoutes navigation. Should be working now
Fix: Enable routes with parameters
Fix submenu navigation
Use one method for error handling.
Implement project creation
Improve inheritance.
Implement logout functionality.
Implement project deleting.
Fix: when clicked back don't show again alert for deleted project.
Implement info pages in admin panel
Add Info Page Controller
Port admin files to front site. Implement config file.
Implement dynamic page title
Confirm deletion.
Implement sending email from front site.
Implement viewing sent messages in admin panel.
Return instance so when you browse between the pages if you go back to previous page content will be still there.
Introduce CKEditor to the project. Now Infopages can be designed better
Fix: php warning for unsuported method.
Fix: Loading infoPage show and project index. I also delete the DB by mistake and here is the new one.
Move getting translation's data to back-end. Implement user create / edit, list users, show user.
Add new fields to users. Make proper update of password field. Show new data.
